Variable.Name: AlrmExpFileName
Variable.Comment: Name of the file for the alarm export

Variable.Name: PwrOffDate_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Date of the last power off expressed in seconds (Unix Timestamp, seconds from January 1st 1970)

Variable.Name: OffMins_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Duration of the power off in minutes

Variable.Name: OffHours_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Duration of the power off in hours

Variable.Name: OffDays_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Duration of the power off in days

Variable.Name: LastOnSec_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Last second in which pCO was on

Variable.Name: LastOnMin_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Last minute in which pCO was on

Variable.Name: LastOnHour_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Last hour in which pCO was on

Variable.Name: LastOnDay_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Last day in which pCO was on

Variable.Name: LastOnMonth_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Last month in which pCO was on

Variable.Name: LastOnYear_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Last year in which pCO was on

Variable.Name: BoardTyp
Variable.Comment: Type of board (12 = c.pCO, 13 = uPC, 14 = c.pCO mini) and size (10 = Large, 11 = Medium, 12 = Small, 13 = XL, 20 = Basic, 21 = Enhanced, 22 = High End)

Variable.Name: MaxWritingsNo
Variable.Comment: Max number of writings for each CheckT period

Variable.Name: CountToTrig
Variable.Comment: Number of warnings before trigger an error (0 means 1)

Variable.Name: MemWarning
Variable.Comment: The last sample has shown a number of writings in retain memory greater than MaxWritingsNo

Variable.Name: MemError
Variable.Comment: Error due to too much writings in retain memory

Variable.Name: MemWritingsNo
Variable.Comment: Absolute number of writings in retain memory during the entire device life

Variable.Name: IN
Variable.Comment: if Rising edge, starts increasing internal timer. If Falling Edge, stops and resets internal timer

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: if TRUE, programmed time is elapsed

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK changes from TRUE to FALSE. FALSE if all other cases

Variable.Name: DayOfWeek
Variable.Comment: Current day of the week (between 1 and 7)

Variable.Name: CurrVer
Variable.Comment: Current version of the application according to standard

Variable.Name: DayIn
Variable.Comment: Writing of new day value enabled by EnDate

Variable.Name: DefDone
Variable.Comment: Default done. Enable for End default mask. If FALSE, default have been succesfully installed

Variable.Name: DST
Variable.Comment: Show if you are in Daylight Saving Time or not (works with En_DaylightSavingTime = TRUE)

Variable.Name: ErrAlrmExp
Variable.Comment: Error code for alarm export operation

Variable.Name: DRIVE
Variable.Comment: 1 = usb pen drive | 0 = internal public flash

Variable.Name: HourIn
Variable.Comment: Writing of new Hour value enabled by EnDate

Variable.Name: ID_Lang
Variable.Comment: Language ID (0: English; 1: Italian; 2: German; 3: French; 4: Spanish). ID_Language = -1 after a wipe retain, so Language selection mask is shown

Variable.Name: LastOnDay
Variable.Comment: Saving of last day before blackout

Variable.Name: LastOnHour
Variable.Comment: Saving of last hour before blackout

Variable.Name: LastOnMinute
Variable.Comment: Saving of last minute before blackout

Variable.Name: LastOnMonth
Variable.Comment: Saving of last month before blackout

Variable.Name: LastOnSecond
Variable.Comment: Saving of last second before blackout

Variable.Name: LastOnYear
Variable.Comment: Saving of last year before blackout

Variable.Name: MinuteIn
Variable.Comment: Writing of new minute value enabled by EnDate

Variable.Name: MonthIn
Variable.Comment: Writing of new month value enabled by EnDate

Variable.Name: NotUsed
Variable.Comment: Mandatory variable connected to Chip I/O. Remove it when you place new I/O in c.design.

Variable.Name: OffDays
Variable.Comment: Number of days since the last blackout

Variable.Name: OffHours
Variable.Comment: Number of hours since the last blackout

Variable.Name: OffMinutes
Variable.Comment: Numbers of minutes since the last blackout

Variable.Name: OffTotMinutes
Variable.Comment: Time in minutes since the last blackout

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK rises from FALSE to TRUE. False in other cases

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK rises from FALSE to TRUE. False in other cases

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK rises from FALSE to TRUE. False in other cases

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK rises from FALSE to TRUE. False in other cases

Variable.Name: ReadTimezone
Variable.Comment: Read the current time zone (works on the rising edge)

Variable.Name: CURR_DATE
Variable.Comment: Current Date and time in ISA format

Variable.Name: ENABLE
Variable.Comment: Enable write (TRUE=update RTC time, FALSE=do nothing)

Variable.Name: SecondIn
Variable.Comment: Writing of new seconds value enabled by EnDate

Variable.Name: __ADI_VALUE
Variable.Comment: ADI hidden parameter for <VALUE> array input

Variable.Name: IN
Variable.Comment: if Rising edge, starts increasing internal timer. If Falling Edge, stops and resets internal timer

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: if TRUE, programmed time is elapsed

Variable.Name: Read_TZR
Variable.Comment: Read the current time zone (works on the edge)

Variable.Name: Set_TZW
Variable.Comment: Set the timezone (works on the edge)

Variable.Name: DayOfWeek
Variable.Comment: Current day of the week (between 1 and 7)

Variable.Name: VerMismatch
Variable.Comment: Check the version of the application. If the version has changed, VersionMatch = TRUE (wipe retain required)

Variable.Name: VerMismatch
Variable.Comment: Check the application version every startup and inform the user if the version hes been changed (VersionMismatch = TRUE)

Variable.Name: WriteVer
Variable.Comment: Enable the application version write after a wipe retain.

Variable.Name: YearIn
Variable.Comment: Writing of new year value enabled by EnDate

Variable.Name: Zone_Write
Variable.Comment: Index of the zone to write
